TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RecommendedActionStateInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information of current state for an Azure SQL Database, Server or Elastic Pool Recommended Action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Azure.ResourceManager.Sql.Models.RecommendedActionCurrentState currentValue) cil managed

Docs.param: Current state the recommended action is in. Some commonly used states are: Active -> recommended action is active and no action has been taken yet. Pending -> recommended action is approved for and is awaiting execution. Executing -> recommended action is being applied on the user database. Verifying -> recommended action was applied and is being verified of its usefulness by the system. Success -> recommended action was applied and improvement found during verification. Pending Revert -> verification found little or no improvement so recommended action is queued for revert or user has manually reverted. Reverting -> changes made while applying recommended action are being reverted on the user database. Reverted -> successfully reverted the changes made by recommended action on user database. Ignored -> user explicitly ignored/discarded the recommended action.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of RecommendedActionStateInfo.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActionInitiatedBy As Nullable(Of RecommendedActionInitiatedBy)

Docs.summary: Gets who initiated the execution of this recommended action. Possible Value are: User -> When user explicity notified system to apply the recommended action. System -> When auto-execute status of this advisor was set to 'Enabled', in which case the system applied it.

Current state the recommended action is in. Some commonly used states are: Active -> recommended action is active and no action has been taken yet. Pending -> recommended action is approved for and is awaiting execution. Executing -> recommended action is being applied on the user database. Verifying -> recommended action was applied and is being verified of its usefulness by the system. Success -> recommended action was applied and improvement found during verification. Pending Revert -> verification found little or no improvement so recommended action is queued for revert or user has manually reverted. Reverting -> changes made while applying recommended action are being reverted on the user database. Reverted -> successfully reverted the changes made by recommended action on user database. Ignored -> user explicitly ignored/discarded the recommended action.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastModified As Nullable(Of DateTimeOffset)

Docs.summary: Gets the time when the state was last modified.
